overview: A gang of bank robbers with a posse in hot pursuit. Riding into the desert, they take refuge in Quantez, a small town they find deserted. Their horses tired and near death, they’re forced to stay the night — with the plan to cross the border into Mexico the next day.
tagline: THEY RODE TO QUANTEZ TOWN...half-way to freedom but all the way to Hell!
title: Quantez
